text: The 1978 Prize of Moscow News was the 13th edition of an international figure skating competition organized in Moscow, Soviet Union. It was held December 6-10, 1978. Medals were awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, pair skating and ice dancing. ==Men== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Rank ! Name !
